ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name != "Data Loader Profile", RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Indirect_Record_Type', ISPICKVAL(End_Customer_Information__c,"Currently Unknown End Customer"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Handover (Prepare for Delivery)') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Win Declaration, End Customer Information field should be "Known End Customer" or "Multiple End Customer".
